lakeus-openmainmenu: The title and label for the sidebar menu.
lakeus-jumptocontent: The “Jump to content” link's text that is only accessible via the keyboard.
lakeus-articlecount: Article counter in the sidebar menu, e.g. 1 Article, 2 Articles. For languages (e.g. Chinese) that needs a delimiter/quantifier (e.g. in Chinese it's smoother to say 1篇文章), be sure to add it.
lakeus-footermessage: The footer message show on every page, linking to the repository. Can be disabled through LakeusShowRepositoryLink.
lakeus-preferences-enable-theme-designer: A preference label. Checking this checkbox will enable Theme Designer on every page.
A preference description. Enable Lakeus Theme Designer on every page.
lakeus-preferences-sticky-toc-donot-auto: A preference label. Checking this checkbox will make it not close sticky TOC when clicking on sticky TOC anchors (links). Alternatively, translate "sticky TOC" as "floating TOC".
A preference description. Alternatively, translate "sticky TOC" as "floating TOC".
lakeus-preferences-smooth-scroll-behavio: A preference label. Checking this checkbox will enable animation on page scrolling.
A preference description. Checking the corresponding checkbox will enable animation on page scrolling.
lakeus-theme-designer: The title of Lakeus Theme Designer form.
lakeus-theme-designer-system-messages-lo: A message appearing in the console, indicating that system messages (l10n) are successfully loaded.
lakeus-theme-designer-all-loaded: A message appearing in the console, indicating that the Theme Designer is all loaded.
lakeus-theme-designer-auto-calculate: A checkbox label. Checking these will disable the corresponding form input and use the automatic calculation provided by the designer for the corresponding setting.
lakeus-theme-designer-do-not-generate: A checkbox label. Checking these will disable the generation of the corresponding setting when generating the theme.
lakeus-theme-designer-copy-theme: A form button. Click it to copy theme CSS code to the clipboard.
lakeus-theme-designer-paste-theme: A form button. Click it to paste current settings to the form.
lakeus-theme-designer-test-theme: A form button. Click it to test the theme out.
lakeus-theme-designer-clear-theme: A form button. Click it to end testing.
lakeus-theme-designer-reset-theme:
A form button. Click it to reset the form.

{{Identical|Reset}}
lakeus-theme-designer-invert-auto-calcul: A form button. Click it to invert the automatic calculation selection.
lakeus-theme-designer-unselect-do-not-ge: A form button. Click it to unselect do not generate selection.
lakeus-theme-designer-copied: A notification text. Shows when theme code is successfully copied to the clipboard.
lakeus-theme-designer-copy-failed: A notification text. Shows when theme code fails to be copied to the clipboard, instead going into the <pre> element at the end of the designer.
lakeus-theme-designer-reload: A form button. Click it to reload the designer.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-picker-fallb: A checkbox label. Checking it will change color pickers to text inputs for fallback use.
lakeus-theme-designer-alpha-channel: A form input placeholder for alpha channel (opacity). It's probably a good idea to keep Alpha as-is, but don't if your language's grammar is against it.
lakeus-theme-designer-basic: A form section title. Settings in this section are the most important ones, as they are the base variables that auto calculation depends on.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-primary: A label of a setting. The primary (or accent, foreground) color.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-secondary: A label of a setting. The secondary (used as background) color.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-neutral: A label of a setting. The neutral color, used on neutral notifications or alike.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-warning: A label of a setting. The warning color, used on warning notifications or alike.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-error: A label of a setting. The error color, used on error notifications or alike.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-success: A label of a setting. The successful color, used on successful notifications or alike.
lakeus-theme-designer-basic-derived: A form section title. Settings in this section are the derivation of basic settings.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-secondary--d: A label of a setting. The derivation of the Secondary color.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-secon: A label of a setting. The derivation of the Secondary color used in borders.
lakeus-theme-designer-global:
A form section title. Settings in this section will affect the whole page.
{{Identical|Global}}
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-b: HTML background color, or the background color of the <html> element.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-link: A label of a setting. The color of normal links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-link--visite: A label of a setting. The color of visited links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-link--active: A label of a setting. The color of active links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-link-new: A label of a setting. The color of new links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-link-new--vi: A label of a setting. The color of visited new links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-link-new--ac: A label of a setting. The color of active new links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-footer-link: A label of a setting. The color of footer links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-footer-link-: A label of a setting. The color of visited footer links.
A label of a setting. The color of active footer links.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-link-externa: A label of a setting. The color of external links.
A label of a setting. The color of visited external links.
A label of a setting. The color of active external links.
lakeus-theme-designer-elevation: A label of a setting. Shadow setting that is used by several elements.
lakeus-theme-designer-font-family: A label of a setting. Default font family that is applied to the whole page.
lakeus-theme-designer-font-family-serif: A label of a setting. Default serif font family. Could be applied to the headings.
lakeus-theme-designer-font-family-action: A label of a setting. Font family applied to the action bar.
lakeus-theme-designer-page-header: A form section title. Settings in this section will affect the page header.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-header: A label of a setting. The background color of the header.
lakeus-theme-designer-header-elevation: A label of a setting. Shadow setting that is used by the header.
lakeus-theme-designer-icon-filter-header: A label of a setting. The filter of the header icons.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-s: A label of a setting. The background color of these search suggestions that would pop up below the search bar.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-searc: A label of a setting. The border color of the search suggestion panel that would pop up below the search bar.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-search-sugge: A label of a setting. The text color of these search suggestions that would pop up below the search bar.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-s: A label of a setting. The background color of the selected (hovered) search suggestion.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-search-sugge: A label of a setting.  text color of the selected (hovered) search suggestion.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-s: A label of a setting. The background color of the search bar.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-searc: A label of a setting. The border color of the search bar.
lakeus-theme-designer-toggle-list: A form section title. Settings in this section will affect the sidebar menu.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-t: A label of a setting. The background color of the sidebar menu.
A label of a setting. The background color of the card at the top of the sidebar menu.
lakeus-theme-designer-logo-text-color-to: A label of a setting. The text color of the logo and the article counter in the card at the top of the sidebar menu.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-t: A label of a setting. The color of the sidebar menu items hovered on.
A label of a setting. The color of the sidebar menu items clicked.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-toggl: A label of a setting. The color of the borders that separate different sections of the sidebar menu.
lakeus-theme-designer-subheader-color-to: A label of a setting. The text color of the subheaders in the sidebar menu.
lakeus-theme-designer-mask-background: A label of a setting. The sidebar menu mask (by default the dimmed part) background.
lakeus-theme-designer-body: A form section title. Settings in this section will affect the page body.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-c: A label of a setting. Body background color, or the background color of the <body> element.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-b: A label of a setting. The background color of the content area, including site notice, the actual page content, categories and so on.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-conte: A label of a setting. The bordor color of some skin elements in the content area, including site notice and categories.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-accent-heade: A label of a setting. The text color of the action header tabs.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-heade: A label of a setting. The border color of the action header tabs.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-tagline: A label of a setting. The color of the tagline.
lakeus-theme-designer-font-family-headin: A label of a setting. Font family of the headings.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-e: A label of a setting. The background color of these edit options in wiki editor.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-edit-: A label of a setting. The border color of these edit options in wiki editor.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-t: A label of a setting. The background color of the table of contents.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-toc: A label of a setting. The border color of the table of contents.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-toc-number: A label of a setting. The text color of the title numbers in the table of contents.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-inter: A label of a setting. The border color of the neutral message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-i: A label of a setting. The background color of the neutral message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-interfa: A label of a setting. The text color of the neutral message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-inter: A label of a setting. The border color of the warning message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-i: A label of a setting. The background color of the warning message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-interfa: A label of a setting. The text color of the warning message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-inter: A label of a setting. The border color of the error message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-i: A label of a setting. The background color of the error message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-interfa: A label of a setting. The text color of the error message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-inter: A label of a setting. The border color of the success message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-i: A label of a setting. The background color of the success message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-interfa: A label of a setting. The text color of the success message box.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-user-: A label of a setting. The border color of the message box informing users about their talk pages.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-u: A label of a setting. The background color of the message box informing users about their talk pages.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-user-me: A label of a setting. The text color of the message box informing users about their talk pages.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-w: A label of a setting. The background color of the table.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-wikit: A label of a setting. The border color of the table.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-w: A label of a setting. The background color of the table header.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-wikitab: A label of a setting. The text color of the table.
lakeus-theme-designer-portlet: A form section title. Settings in this section will affect the dropdown menus.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-p: A label of a setting. The background color of dropdown menus.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-portlet: A label of a setting. The text color of dropdown menus.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-p: A label of a setting. The color of the dropdown menu items hovered on.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-portlet: A label of a setting. The text color of the dropdown menu items hovered on.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-p: A label of a setting. The color of the dropdown menu items clicked.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-portlet: A label of a setting. The text color of the dropdown menu items clicked.
lakeus-theme-designer-border-color-portl: A label of a setting. The border color of dropdown menus.
lakeus-theme-designer-footer: A form section title. Settings in this section will affect the footer.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-f: A label of a setting. The background color of the footer.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-footer: The text color of the footer.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-toggle-: A label of a setting. The text color of sidebar menu items.
A label of a setting. The text color of sidebar menu items hovered on.
A label of a setting. The text color of sidebar menu items clicked.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-content: A label of a setting. The text color of the content area.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-header: A label of a setting. The text color of the header.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-body: A label of a setting. The text color of the body.
lakeus-theme-designer-color-accent-heade: A label of a setting. The text color of a selected tab in the action header.
A label of a setting. The text color of a red link tab in the action header.
lakeus-theme-designer-sticky-toc: A form section title. Settings in this section will affect Sticky table of contents.
lakeus-theme-designer-background-color-t: A label of a setting. The background color of the sticky table of contents button.
lakeus-theme-designer-icon-filter-toc-bu: A label of a setting. The filter of the sticky table of contents button's icon.
lakeus-theme-designer-text-color-sticky-: A label of a setting. The text color of the title numbers in the sticky table of contents.
lakeus-theme-designer-danger-zone: A form section title. Settings in this section will affect the current input in the form.
